name: Zraq the World Ender
description:
Join Zraq and his trusty Mechanoid companion as they attempt to blow up planets and destroy the universe!

 This is the first game I've released. It's a short demo and its a bit rough around the edges, but I've enjoyed working on it these past few months, Any criticism is much appreciated, and keep an eye out for my future projects, it's only up from here!
